hub.title: Mini-Games Hub
hub.subtitle: A collection of classic arcade and puzzle games built with React, PixiJS, and Tailwind CSS.

descriptions.snake: Classic snake game. Eat apples, grow longer, don't hit the wall.
descriptions.tetris: Stack the falling blocks to clear lines.
descriptions.pacman: Eat all the dots while avoiding ghosts.
descriptions.2048: Combine tiles to reach the number 2048.
descriptions.minesweeper: Find the mines without detonating them.
descriptions.breakout: Destroy all bricks with the ball.

controls.reveal: Left click to reveal, Right click to flag
controls.tiles: Use Arrow Keys to move tiles

snake.restartHint: Press Space or click Play to restart
